website_summaries.verdict: Made of food grade stainless steel, this zester's 8-inch blade will stay sharp as you use it.
pros: This inexpensive and lightweight model features a comfortable handle that's easy to grip
Cleaning is a breeze since it can go straight into the dishwasher
Comes with a protective cover to ensure it stays sharp
cons: Plastic cover is finicky and gets stuck on sometimes

customer_reviews.title: I used it to grate butter! LOL
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fun with this thing. It takes the zest off of citrus with little effort. It minced my ginger for my recipe super fine. I can't find my nutmeg, but when I do... I even used it to grate cold butter over a cooked dish to make it melt faster and more evenly, that was fun, but not fun to clean. Just run really hot water over it, both sides, don't even think of trying to use your kitchen brush to get the bits out. It will eat it. Don't use your fingers either. get a tooth pick or a skewer if something doesn't rinse out.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect! I love cooking with it and just all around happy we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Loucios

customer_reviews.title: Raniaco Zester is the best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Raniaco Zester is the best I have ever used. I got it for a Christma's present and have been using it on all sorts of foods. Lemons, oranges, chocolate, cheeses and more. It's quite long & you need to be careful not to get your knuckles scraped. The Zester parts are very sharp! It has a storage container so you can safely grab it out of the drawer. It just takes a minute or two to make plain food look special & festive. So zest away & watch those fingers!
customer_reviews.author: L.M.R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very effective grater.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the thin long one and the slightly larger grater (which I use more often). The reason I am giving a four star is the curve design along the edges of this thin long grater. It ends up housing lots of the grated food, you end up poking out. So for my ginger I tend to use the larger grater, and for a quick grate on the pot, I use this thin versatile long one. Having said that, I would highly recommend getting both graters, they are super sharp, like of which you rarely can find.
customer_reviews.author: jan kassay

customer_reviews.title: Plastic housing is cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic housing is a cheap material and broke only after a few uses. Spend a few dollars more and get a fully metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Kebab Remover

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 4 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: I made a review earlier and this tool was good. Today the plastic housing cracked in half and I got plastic shards in my food. Now the tool is worth nothing. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: 236keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - perfect for zesting lemons and limes!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say that I "love" a grater, but for a kitchen utensil this is a great product! Very easy to use, effortless to zest lemons, limes, etc. Perfect each time. The grater itself is rather long but I must admit that I like it. Sturdy construction and handle is easy to grip. This comes with a nice plastic cover to help protect the cutting surface.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer99Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok with garlic. Did not do well with onion. Not sharp at all. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great but Breakable
customer_reviews.text: The grater worked well but the handle broke after a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: zestfully inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This thing really sucks for citrus. Root vegetables maybe but the description says zester. Also I cut my finger bad running it along the back edge trying to get food out of it. Beware cleaning as the edges are not rounded.
customer_reviews.author: bananaphone

customer_reviews.title: Too deep and not a fine grate
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to rip into the skin of the lemon and limes and not necessarily a fine grate. The teeth are jagged and ends up digging too deep into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: This Raniaco Zester Stainless Steel Grater is the handiest tool in my drawer
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a tool like this, I didn't know how handy to would become. It is sturdy, sharp, and convenient to use, it is large enough and bright enough it won't get lost in the drawer. The price is comparable to other tools but the quality puts it a step above the rest. The best thing about it, is the plastic cover, it pulls double duty. Its cover saves the blade from dulling while bouncing around in the drawer and protects your fingers when not in use it can also be used on the underside to catch your zested food. Clean up with a quick rinse and your good.
customer_reviews.author: Buznbyu

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice zester. The blade is VERY sharp so I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice zester. The blade is VERY sharp so I'm super glad it came with a cover for the blade area. However, the blade cover has two holes in it and is a bit hard to put on and remove. Because of that, I constantly worry I'm going to grate a finger open which kind of sucks. Also, the metal is a bit thin and can see this being dented very easily if dropped at an angle on hard floors like tile. Other than those two bits, this is a nice zester/grater. Just what I needed for all my dessert recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly dulled.
customer_reviews.text: It was never very effective and after about 10 uses it was too dull to really use. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It zests fine - my big complaint is that the small blades ...
customer_reviews.text: It zests fine - my big complaint is that the small blades extend to the sides of the tool, and cut my thumb numerous times while zesting... The blades are fashioned in such a way that the zester will tend to slip diagonally while pulling across the fruit... and if it cant be really well controlled it will run up against your fingers... and will cut you. The blades should not be on the side. Unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not like other zesters I have used. Dangerous product the slots are to big and very easy to cut yourself. I struggled to zest a lime the first time I used it and cut myself. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: soilchemist

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and aggressive. A good value alternative to a micro plane
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use exclusively with savory items like garlic and ginger so I didn’t cross contaminate my micro plane that I use for baking. The grating on this model is far more aggressive than the grating on a micro plane So if you are using it to zesty lemon for example it will zest much deeper than a micro plane. It does however make quick work of things like Ginger and garlic but be aware it is also very sharp and can easily cut the tips of your fingers. Mine arrived slightly dented on the end but it was easily bent back into shape. Overall it is a well-made product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Was all bent up when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works well. It was bent when I got it though. Disappointing to pay for an already damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No more *almost* zesting my hands or fingers!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a really cheap zester that I nearly took chunks of skin off attempting to use. This zester is amazingly easy to use, most of whatever you are zesting is caught by the cover that you can place directly under while zesting - which is awesome in preventing zest from flying everywhere. It takes minimal effort to use this and have had great luck with it catching the zest and not white underneath. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, does a ‘grate’ job!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was put off by the size of this but it’s very easy to use, does a great job zesting (so far I’ve only used it for lemon zest) - so easy and effortless, I can see myself grating cheese, carrots, etc with ease. I bought this primarily because of the plastic guard and hadn’t paid any attention to the size - it’s about a foot long and about 2” wise with the guard on but well worth the extra space it’ll take up. Also I hadn’t thought about the dual purpose of the guard - but when turned around it can hold the gratings (I probably missed that also in the remarks/reviews!) Two thumbs up. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Easy Reader

customer_reviews.title: It is not smooth or easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is not smooth or easy to use. When zesting lemons/limes, it pulls the pith instead of just the top layer - even with minimal pressure
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Newman

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for garlic, ginger, limes/lemons
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this zester, it took forever to grate garlic/ginger and zest citrus. I’d chop garlic and use a box grater for the others. This is a GAME CHANGER. Makes it so easy to quickly grate and zest ingredients directly into a pot. Washing the zester with a sponge (in the same direction as the scales) is a breeze. Only con - sometimes zested ingredients (on the backside of the zester) gets caught but it’s easy enough to grab a utensil to scoop it out.
customer_reviews.author: jwang26

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this to zest, and it works great! I have had it for just t a few days, so will be using it for cheese, etc., soon. I got lots and lots of zest from a slightly soft lemon....was very pleased. I would not have had more than a few flakes of zest after a long struggle with my old box grater (which is going in the trash). Also,I stuck it under the faucet as the directions suggest, and the zester is sparkling clean. Easy (and safe).
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull blades, almost impossible to zest
customer_reviews.text: Dull blades, almost impossible to zest, cover doesn’t fit (which actually doesn’t matter because the blades are so dull). Plus it is so curved over on the back side what little is able to be zested gets stuck. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magical Zester
customer_reviews.text: First time buying and using a zester for my hello fresh meals. Usually I require to zest a lemon or some citrus fruit, and had to skip out due to not having a zester. Zesting with this tool is very easy and it does not require much effort. It mini blades are very sharp and you can zest a lemon in seconds. Very happy with my purchase! Cleaning it becomes a bit difficult though.. I usually just rinse it and wipe the excess zest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have never had such a nice grater.
customer_reviews.text: With just moving back into our new home after the rebuild from the fire I decided to add this grater/ lemon zester to our kitchen tools. I was so happy when it came with how nice it is, and how easy it is to use. If I was to have anyone ask where to get a lemon zester/grater this would be the one I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Willis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: For zesting, I was using different sizes of cheese graters and became tired of trying to scrape wet flakes off of the graters and the effort it takes to avoid zesting my fingers too. Finally gave in to buy another gadget. This is so much better. Slides smoothly over the lemons and dry flakes remain in the back of the zester, easily emptied. Fingers are safe. The only thing I would suggest is that there be a note included stating whether or not the plastic cover --perfect for storage--is dishwasher safe or not.
customer_reviews.author: July

customer_reviews.title: Can I return a used food prep item?
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it feels and the cover but that's it. Very small surface area, blades only face one direction, the sides are so deep it's impossible to get everything out, and the edges of the sides are plain metal so you risk damaging your cutting board/pan/hand if you try to knock your food free. Purchased to replace a decade-old OXO zester because this one is slightly cheaper, should have spent the extra few bucks. It would probably be ok for dry foods like very hard cheese or chocolate but I mostly need it for citrus, ginger, and garlic. Hope whoever finds it at the thrift store grates a lot of parmesan!
customer_reviews.author: ESONeill

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I hardly used it 4-5 times to zest lemon and orange. The blades are not sharp anymore. Cannot zest lemon or anything with it now. Completely useless. I do not recommend this tool . The one I bought from dollar store works better than this one. Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laila Talat

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable stainless steel grater/zester
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable little device. It is so sharp as to be dangerous if you're careless. The rubber "feet" help grip well, the handle is comfortable to grip, the length of the grating surface is sufficient to do serious grating/zesting. Clean-up was not a problem either. This exceeded my expectations in price, features, and SHARPNESS. I zested sour orange and Meyer's lemon in no time at all, and with little physical effort. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: FlJudy

customer_reviews.title: Execellent..finally found one that really zests.
customer_reviews.text: For years I did not understand why small graters were not doing what a grater was suppose to do. I did not do research about this and finally with a recipe I had for 1 TBSP. of lemon zest I said...ok lets find out how professionals do it. I received this zester after reading reviews and was amazed. I have used it only once and probably will wear a glove when using it as I know it is sharp and if I get the smallest of cuts it is a problem for me. So as others discussed be careful using.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble Bee

customer_reviews.title: Blades are pretty dull
customer_reviews.text: Great design and love the cover provided but the actual blade doesn't work that well. You really have to work at it to process ginger with this grater. Doesn't seem sharp enough to do the job because I have to press pretty hard and hardly anything comes out. Same problem with my last grater. Guess I'll keep trying til I find one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good zester
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this for culinary schooling and it seems like a great product! I haven’t used it yet however it is a bit big so it’s bulky however it comes with a cover so if I put it with my other utensils it won’t scratch them or myself which is nice! When I use this I will explain more why I like the zester
customer_reviews.author: Savanha Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester!
customer_reviews.text: This zester was used to replace a 15 year old microplane that had been very worn and loved. I really like the bigger surface area on this one, as well as the plastic frame around the grate the guards your hands from getting nicked in case your fingers slip. Super ergonomical handle too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ritvik Bhattacharjee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was always a hassle to use my large grater for cheese and garlic which I use a lot. This is a great grater for these small jobs which is easy to use and the easy to wash. I wish the slider has larger capacity but still very handy and useful. Overall a nice addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Eehsan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: As a cook, I have one similar to this one I have used for years. Although, it is still great, I wanted a new one for shredding very hard Parmesan cheese. This will definitely work perfectly. I have already run it though the dishwasher and it is fine. Ready to use now :) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This zester sucks could be used as a cheese grater though
customer_reviews.text: This zester sucks could be used as a cheese grater though. The holes are huge the metal too high to get zest. It will go past the fine zest layer into the bitter white part or the actual fruit depending on thickness.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Im official now
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a microplane after being discouraged from getting one for so many years by my husband who would constantly ask do you really need that? Yes sir I REALLY NEED this microplane! You need it to go on click buy now or add to cart and you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool for everyone who loves to cook with garlic. It can be placed in a drawer or hung in the kitchen. It is very simple to use and clean. Made from high quality stainless steel. Plastic protection is design to protect your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: DB customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy sharp! First orange I zested went deep into the pith till I radically adjusted the pressure. Once you get used to it, works great. Did I mention it’s razor sharp? The plastic sleeve for catching the grate is very useful too.
customer_reviews.author: myshopper

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I misplaced my Zester right before the holidays so I bought this to hold me over. While it did the job, it didn't have a cover, was not as comfortable to hold and seemed harder to clean because the sides were bent closer to the back than the one I usually use. Since my favorite one hasn't shown up yet, I'll continue to use this one. It's not bad, I'm just used to something a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sharp, efficient
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have a zester in my kitchen tools drawer and wanted to make lemon shortbread, which required the zest of one lemon. This zester fit all my requirements - stainless steel, reasonably priced, good reviews, easy to use. And it is all of those things. Turned out I didn’t care for the recipe, but I am delighted I now have a zester.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The grater is very sharp. It makes quick work of grating ginger and garlic and does a fantastic job of zesting. I like that it is very easy to clean, is a convenient size for all tasks, and it has a sturdy plastic storage cover.
customer_reviews.author: John W2000

customer_reviews.title: A game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This thing is fantastic! I do Every Plate meal delivery and started needing to zest citrus fruits. This does it so much better than my old fashion grater! I love that you can flip the sleeve around and catch your zest! Definitely a great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: littlefriend

customer_reviews.title: Best grater/zester I've bought in a while!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome zester/grater. We use it to grate parmesan, ginger, garlic, citrus zest, and also cotija cheese. I love that it's wide and the cover acts as a catcher if you attach it underneath the grater. One of my fave purchases so far!
customer_reviews.author: GmrMom

customer_reviews.title: Zester is the Bester!
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying this kitchen tool. What is hard to explain is that the zest of citrus (lemon,orange,lime) has very deep flavor, & the use of the zester imparts an amazing taste. Use it in salad dressings, sauces and baking--you will not believe the depth of flavor. It also can be used for cheeses, & vegetables. It's a great addition to my kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have this! About the product: Good weight, sturdy quality, and has a protective plastic cover which I did not even realize when I ordered. The product arrived quickly and I put it to use that day. I had my company Christmas party and could not wait to zest some orange into my cranberry sauce. The caterer asked me where I got it because he is looking for one as well.. I can't wait to use it for French toast and my lemon sauce for chicken. Zesting adds a layer of flavor to simple recipes and I am confident that this one will be well loved for many years!
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Works great for zesting lemons, and the occasional knuckle. Seriously this thing is crazy sharp. It makes quick work of zesting a lemon but be careful because it will just as quickly remove skin if the fruit slips and your hand bumps the grating surface. Personally I love it but I quickly learned to be very cautious using it!
customer_reviews.author: ParrotPilot

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently joined the meal kit revolution, beforehand I rarely zested fruit. This is a great price and amazing quality. It creates a perfect zest with little effort, does not over snag, and its easy to clean! It hasn’t rusted in water so it’s definitely a good quality AND it hasn’t lost it’s sharpness after 10+ uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a zester!
customer_reviews.text: We had an old zester and when we moved we couldn't find it again. I thought it had worked fine but now that we have this new grater I see how bad the old one was. The biggest issue you will have is to not scrape off too much peel because it is so easy. Zest, especially lemon and lime is a great addition to many dishes. You will have wonderfully grated peels with this product. Easy to hold and very sharp. Remember to use the cover when not in use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TLDMAT

customer_reviews.title: I wish this was a little longer.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few that has a grate guard that can be reversed so it catches what you grate. I like the size of the blades and works well for zesting citrus and grating/minsing ginger. I have even used this for hard cheeses. I just wish it was a bit longer in size but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grater does the job
customer_reviews.text: Wanted/needed a zester and this is a good one. Have had no problems. It is sharp, as zesters should be, so take care. I grated part of my thumb being too hasty/aggressive. Ouch. Has a nice plastic sleeve to protect you when reaching into the drawer; however, there are two cut outs on the plastic sleeve that expose the grating edge. Not sure why the sleeve would not have been solid plastic. With the two holes you might accidentally reach in and graze your fingers on the open spot. I have not done that yet...so I would still give this a nice rating.
customer_reviews.author: Marci B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: Unlike those box graters, this cleans very easily. I was getting annoyed at how hard those box graters are to clean so I bought this. With this you just grate and then everything just mostly rinses right off and whatever doesn't rinse off you can just quickly brush off. I'm going to look to see if I can find a larger hole version of these, because the holes for this are pretty small. Grates well.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Grates very, very fine.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Just know it grates more than tiny. I tried to grate an onion and it was juice when finished. I think it will work with nuts and some cheese that you need very grated.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Elza

customer_reviews.title: Grate kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have been making lemon meringue pies for 40 years, always using fresh lemons and knicking my knuckles on the grater for the lemon zest. I never really considered buying one since I had a cheese grater. This is so much better and easier, I won't be without one again.
customer_reviews.author: Melaine Mero

customer_reviews.title: Best Zester yet
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful investment. It's sharp and just works. I've had others where the lemon skin gets caught or the cane sugar stick cracks instead of finely crumbs. This zester/grater just does the job and it's smooth and sharp. Would recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Wong

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to hold, orange version is a very nice pop of color. Grating is thin, perfect for resting. Also useful for hard cheese grating. Overall good price for a descent product.
customer_reviews.author: Zyta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this. So easy to handle and the lid works great as container. Very happy with my purchase, my friend who is a chef got one after checking mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This one is way better than the one I got from BB&B! The zester things are higher so it actually does something! My last one wouldn't do much, so I had to use a lot of pressure to get anything to happen. This new one is so much better! It actually does its job, and is ready to hold and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Of Sharon Rice

customer_reviews.title: best tool in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool in my kitchen. It is so easy & fast to grate lemon & orange peel. Have used on ginger also. The greated product is so fine. It makes awesome flavored sauces and marinades. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: LovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great zester
customer_reviews.text: The grater is easy to hold and zests blocks of hard cheese very easily. It’s very long but the quality is great. I wish they had a smaller one for a quick zest.
customer_reviews.author: Arbil

customer_reviews.title: Zester
customer_reviews.text: So, I haven’t needed to use it yet so I can’t really review it. It seems to be good quality and to be very sturdy. I like the cover it comes with. I Love the color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to zest dozens of lemons at a time for limoncello. Stil hard work no matter how you zest it, but this does a good job and makes it a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this grader
customer_reviews.text: I had never been so excited about a kitchen tool in my life. This grader works amazing! It’s easy to hold and conveniently thin so I can use it with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I specifically bought this one because you can flip the plastic guard around and grate inside of it. Keeps the shavings from going everywhere and super easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: very sharp and effetive
customer_reviews.text: This zester creates a very fine peel which is lovely. It is also very sharp so care is required using it (as I learned the hard way). Practice makes perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Master Horne

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very High Quality. I'm a chef and this made my knife bag, which isn't any easy thing to do. Must have for any aspiring cook and chef. It is sharp, well made, and holds all the zest in the well, so you don't have try as scrape as you would on a box grater.
customer_reviews.author: chicagowrtr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Parmesan!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this for anything else other than to grate our parmesan reggiano cheese and it works wonderfully. I love how compact it is and I feel safe using it. It cleans very easily and the blades are nice and sharp. The handle has a nice firm grip and feels durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Right Size & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The gripping is very strong while zesting the toughest frozen cheese or a hard potato . No signs of steel rusting. Loving it & will continue to use it for longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Girish R Ahuja

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in hands
customer_reviews.text: I love that the grater is long enough and comfortable in my hand. I love grating garlic. This has nothing to do with the grater but I wish there was a way I could protect my hands while using it... kinda like the hand protector when using a mandolin. Washing it was very simple and easy. I havent put it in the dishwasher as of yet and I dont think that I wouldnt seeing that clean up is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: raquel foreman

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp, easy to hold but all the zest seems to get stuck in the grate, so you have to work to get it off the zester, crazy.
customer_reviews.author: pjenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Grater!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used this type grater, so I was skeptical as to how well it would work. Using the old fashion grater was always "iffy" because I had to make sure I didn't scrape my fingers in the process. This slim, long-handled grater was so easy to use and clean. I am so glad I made the purchase. It will become a very important item in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: WYB

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sharp zester
customer_reviews.text: Way to use is to place metal end on plate and rub lime or lemon onto the SHARP metal zester--at least this is how it worked for me! It's very good and easy to use--just be sure to wash under spray faucet immediately after use so it stays clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mia P.

customer_reviews.title: Zests quickly and the zest comes out easily
customer_reviews.text: Our family absolutely loves this grater. In fact this is our second purchase because we left our other behind after our last trip. Most of the things we cook require zesting and grating so we take it with us when we travel. We have bought several other graters and this is by far the best. It zests quickly and the zest comes out easily from the grater unlike other units we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAST, SHARP, AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great price, amazing product! Tried garlic cloves 1st & couldn’t believe how SUPER sharp & SO fast .... job complete in SECONDS! Easy to use, hold, & clean at 1/2 the price of the grocery store. Wish I would have bought one years ago 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: For my ginger root this grater is perfect. It has the balance and feel of a ...
customer_reviews.text: For my ginger root this grater is perfect. It has the balance and feel of a fine surgical instrument, and cuts like one. Easy to clean after use with a soft sponge. And the snap-on nylon shield to protect the hundreds of cutting nibs from drawer rash is easy to take on and take off. My hats off to Zester for such a fine, enjoyable-to-use grater.
customer_reviews.author: Pat L. Hart

customer_reviews.title: I thought the handle would be helpful but I like my Pampered Chef one much better
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. My hand kept slipping off the handle. It was very awkward. I thought the handle would be helpful but I like my Pampered Chef one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Wernsing

customer_reviews.title: Great zester...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use a zester probably everyday. In fact, I bought this a backup for when my other zester is in the dishwasher. Well, this is the my go-to now. Great price and service.
customer_reviews.author: annwrite460

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and easy to use. I like the plastic cover for storage. Nice and sharp, and hopefully will stay that way for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to hold and works much better than the bigger graters on the market. It is small so easy to store. It works quickly as it is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and impressed with the quality of it. Easy to use and like the design. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Finally a zester that works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sharp! Easily takes zest from citrus, even if they are a bit soft. It is also a fantastic hard cheese grater...grates hard parmesan with almost no effort. Nutmeg grated on this and into its sleeve cuts down on the traditional mess that usually ensues. Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Zester
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth purchase of your Zester. I originally got one for myself and was so happy that I have been buying them for children, friends, and now a grandchild. Love in the AM when making blueberry pancakes and we add the zest of a lemon to the mix. Yummy. I keep the plastic cover on at all times.
customer_reviews.author: fredflower

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to grate lemons, it is so very easy to use and clean! I see fragrant fine zest as the end product and couldnt be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RBPrime

customer_reviews.title: Quality, usability.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Easy to wash and clean. Very durable and stable when you holding it in hand. Easy to zest hard cheese, lemon skin,etc... Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent zester for everything from lemon rind to hard cheeses.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I've bought 2 other zesters, and this is by far the best. Especially the consistency of parmesan cheese and other hard cheeses. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LoveReading

customer_reviews.title: Works almost TOO well!
customer_reviews.text: Does this work? Yes, way better than the one I used to have from Walmart. In fact, it works so well it zested the lemon down to the fruit in seconds. You have to keep rotating the fruit to keep it even. But be careful because I zested my finger the 1st time I used it. Keep those fingers out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: BinaryCode

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing to make the bottom of slippery heels rougher so it was perfectly fine for that. But the thing isn't really that sharp. I was expecting it to cut me upon touching the little ridges but it didn't. I'm pretty sure it works great for grating soft foods like cheese. All in all okay for $5
customer_reviews.author: Norin Mosharraf

customer_reviews.title: Comparison: This Grater is 5-Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparing, like I always do when it came to this product. Not only was it just as good in all areas of quality in comparison to the more expensive ones, but significantly better in price! That’s a 5-Star in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Runkles

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Found out one of my daughters didn't have one so I had to remedy that. This did the job. Inexpensive but feels and works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best zester-cheese grater I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best zester-cheese grater I've ever used, so I now own two. I like it so much I bought a second one for our weekend beach house. It's easy to use and easy to clean. I read it's dishwasher safe but I've always washed it by hand. You can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: NancyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Great zester. Best value for the money. Works awesome for my cooking and baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Really sharp and the plastic cover that comes with it really helps to keep your countertop clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lemon Zester
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to Home Chef, and some recipes require me to zest a lemon. I bought this zester to help with that task. Very easy to zest a lemon without much force. My 5-year-old easily used this when she wanted to help me. A little tricky to clean (like most graters), but still easy to do so. LOVE the protective cover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic East to Use Zester
customer_reviews.text: Wow it is extremely easy to zest items now! I used an antique zested first years and just upgraded to this. What an amazing difference it makes!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hall

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried yet but looks great. Will update later if any issues. So far 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ana DeRochè

customer_reviews.title: He's always just used a cheese grater when he needed to zest something but it never seemed to get great results. He never compla
customer_reviews.text: I don't cook much, but my husband does so I bought him this zester as a gift. He's always just used a cheese grater when he needed to zest something but it never seemed to get great results. He never complained or said anything, but I just always thought a zester would be easier. He finally used the zester for the first time tonight and his response was, "a thousand times better than using a cheese grater!" He said it's so much easier and such a huge difference - wish we had gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Bonillo M

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is what my wife says, who I bought it for. “It’s wonderful to actually have a zester. Easy to use and clean. I love it!”
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sturges

customer_reviews.title: This made zesting a lemon effortless!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I’ve never had a zester, but it made it so easy! I don’t know why I waited so long to buy one!
customer_reviews.author: TLVE0402

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a good-sized well balanced and very sharp. I've only had it for a short time but I have used it to zest lemons and limes twice already. As I said it is really sharp, zest well and the cover is great it keeps it safe in a drawer or a basket as I store it. And I guess the best thing of all is, it wasn't tremendously expensive but it's very good quality and I expect to be able to use it for quite a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Raniaco Zester Stainless Steel Grater, Long Ergonomic Handle Cheese, Lemon, Ginger & Potato Zester with Plastic Cover, with Rubber Base (Black)
feature_bullets: Original Raniaco zester is made of food grade stainless steel and non-slip slilicone rubber.
Raniaco zester is produced with exclusive etching technology, which is excellent for cheese, lemon, ginger, coconut, chocolate, carrot etc.
It's easy to clean only if you wash along with its blades. Safe storing and transportation of the zester is made easier with the plastic cover.
Size: Stainless steel blades:8" Rubber Handle 4.8"
Sharp blades of the zester are highly resistant to blunting over time assuring long usability of the kitchenware. But take care not to hurt your fingers during the use. use.
